tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE driver_behavior_tracking (
    driver_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    event_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    event_type VARCHAR,
    speed FLOAT,
    acceleration FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE trips (
  trip_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  driver_id INT,
  trip_date DATE,
  start_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  end_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  distance_km DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE violations (
  violation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  driver_id INT,
  violation_date DATE,
  violation_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  violation_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE trip(
	trip_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	driver_id INT,
	vehicle_id INT,
	start_location VARCHAR(100),
	end_location VARCHAR(100),
	trip_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE tripreport (
  trip_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  driver_id INT REFERENCES driver_info(driver_id),
  trip_date DATE,
  trip_distance FLOAT,
  trip_duration INT
);

CREATE TABLE speeding_events (
  event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trip_id INT REFERENCES tripreport(trip_id),
  event_date DATE,
  speed_limit INT,
  actual_speed INT
);

CREATE TABLE alert_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  driver_id INT REFERENCES driver_info(driver_id),
  alert_type VARCHAR(50),
  alert_time DATETIME,
  alert_message TEXT
);
